wikipedia_page.main: Edward Samuel Evans Hartopp (7 September 1820 – 5 October 1894) was an English first-class cricketer who played for Cambridge University, Nottinghamshire and several amateur cricket teams between 1841 and 1857. He was born at Thurnby, Leicestershire and died at Pickenham Hall, near Swaffham, Norfolk.

response: Issue: Edward Samuel Evans Hartopp Edward Hartopp (cricketer) 7 September 1820 – 5 October 1894
